title: JSON schema for AWS ElasticBeanstalk windows deployment manifest

iisConfig.description: Configuration to apply to IIS before deploying applications

appPools.description: This list of IIS App Pools to configure.

appPool.description: An App Pool to configure in IIS before deploying applications

name.description: The name of the app pool

enable32Bit.description: Enables a 32-bit application to run on a computer that runs a 64-bit version of Windows

managedPipelineMode.description: Request-processing mode that an application pool uses

managedRuntimeVersion.description: Specifies the .NET Runtime version to be used by the application pool

queueLength.description: Indicates to HTTP.sys how many requests to queue for an application pool before rejecting future requests

cpu.description: Properties for configuring the app pool's cpu usage

limitPercentage.description: Configures the maximum percentage of CPU time that the worker processess in an application pool are allowed to consume

limitAction.description: The action to take when the CPU limit is reached

limitMonitoringInterval.description: Specifies the reset period (in minutes) for CPU monitoring and throttling limits on the application pool

recycling.description: Properties for configuring the app pool's policy for recycling the process

regularTimeInterval.description: Period of time (in minutes) after which an application pool will recycle

requestLimit.description: Maximum number of requests an application pool can process before it is recycled

memory.description: Specifies the amount of virtual memory (in kilobytes) that a worker process can use before the worker process is recycled

privateMemory.description: Specifies the amount of private memory (in kilobytes) that a worker process can use before the worker process recycles

deployments.description: This list of applications to deploy.

msDeploy.description: Applications that are deployed using MSDeploy.exe.

name.description: The name of the application. This value must be unique for all applications deployed in the manifest.

appBundle.description: The path to the application appBundle relative to the manifest file.

iisWebSite.description: The IIS Web Site to deploy the application to.

iisPath.description: The virtual directory path configured in IIS for the application.

appPool.description: The app pool that will run this application. If the app pool does not exist then a new app pool will be created with IIS default values.

aspNetCoreWeb.description: The list of ASP.NET Core applications to be deployed with IIS support.

name.description: The name of the application. This value must be unique for all applications deployed in the manifest.

appBundle.description: The path to the application appBundle relative to the manifest file. This can be either a path to a zip archive or a directory relative to the manifest file.

iisWebSite.description: The IIS Web Site to deploy the application to.

iisPath.description: The virtual directory path configured in IIS for the application.

appPool.description: The app pool that will run this application. If the app pool does not exist then a new app pool will be created with IIS default values.

name.description: The name of the application. This value must be unique for all applications deployed in the manifest.

manifestVersion.description: The version of the manifest this file is compatible with.
